DemoDays

Student demos at the intersection of art, design and code.

July 2012

Archival Content • Submit correction

The July 2012 DemoDays was held on 07/21/2012 at Pivotal Labs in New York City.

Join us next time!

DemoDays is a monthly student-run event in NYC, organized by tech@NYU, Parsons Code Club, Create@Cooper and Columbia ADI. We're all about fostering a community of students who create things. We want to provide a platform for student builders to present their work, to celebrate their creations, and let that inspire other students to build projects they care about.

  • Wanna show off?

    SIGN UP

  • Wanna hang out?

Demos

  • Oops, we don't have any data for this month yet. If you showed your work at DemoDays July 2012, please submit a correction!

Speaker

R. Luke Dubois

Mr. Lieberman is an awesome New York-based artist and creator with work ranging from co-founding open frameworks to building a tool that allows people to draw with their eyes.
